nodes.text: The Hutt Flats, also known as Grand Arena Flats, was the last segment of the Boonta Eve Classic podrace. Thousands of years prior, it was the bed of prehistoric Lake Anre, which, via underground tributaries, flowed into the Dune Sea.
During the race of 32 BBY, Sebulba's pod was destroyed by Anakin Skywalker in the Hutt Flats. At this part of the Boonta Eve Classic the podracer Neva Kee vanished.
